32  public static PColor Other(this PColor color) =>
33  color == PColor.White ? PColor.Red : PColor.White;
34 
44  public static PShape Shape(this PColor color) =>
45  color == PColor.White ? PShape.Round : PShape.Square;
46 
57  public static bool FriendOf(this PColor color, Piece piece) =>
58  color == piece.color || color.Shape() == piece.shape;
59 
68  public static Winner ToWinner(this PColor color) =>
69  color == PColor.White ? Winner.White : Winner.Red;
70  }
